name: accel-mma84
description: Library to run the MMA8452Q accelerometer.
readme:
# MMA8452Q accelerometer driver

Install:

```
npm install accel-mma84
```

Import:

```
var accel = require('accel-mma84').connect(myhardwareapi);
```

Functions:

*  **`accel`.initialize()**

*  **`accel`.getAcceleration(callback(err, xyz))**
